title: Schema
description: Creates a new shape in the given or default project.

name.description: The name of the new build.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the build?

path.description: The path at which to create the class, relative to the workspace root.

skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new class.

schematicsDataFile.description: Path where schematics-data file is located.

ngCliCmdChain.description: angular cli command chain (generated from ng-joint-schematics-data.json).

generatePath.description: The path where shape modules are generated.

generatedExports.description: Export-statements of generated components and modules.

lintFix.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the class.
